channel.title: How do you stop it!
channel.description:
HOW DO YOU STOP THE LUAGHING SYNDROM BOT OMG! THIS HAS BEEN ON MY SERVER FOR 4 WEEKS NOW AND IT'S PISISNG ME OFF!
time: 21.43.37 | rglpdvee£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e time: 21.43.40 | rglpdvee£: ££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££ time: 21.43.52 | rglpdvee£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e time: 21.43.55 | rglpdvee£: ££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££ time: 21.44.6 | rglpdvee£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e time: 12.50.13 | cyplwckt£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e time: 12.50.17 | cyplwckt£: ££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££ time: 12.50.31 | cyplwckt£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e time: 12.50.32 | cyplwckt£: ££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££ time: 12.50.44 | cyplwckt£: e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e
HELP ME PLEASE

[/quote]
He uses random different proxy’s

but how the bot found my server? And i tried to shut down for a week for my server so it stop but like 5 mins after i turned they come again, and i tried to ipban but they can still connect with different ip… they change ip everytime :s

Probably from a server list.[/quote]
if (connectedFrom.contains(“sccoast.net”)) {

wont work than

item.title: How do you stop it!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:20, topic:282322"]Search for this:

int UID = inStream.readDWord();

add this under:

[code] if (connectedFrom.contains(“sccoast.net”)) {
appendToBannedIps(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + connectedFrom);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code][/quote]Oo does this stop laughin man from attacking? O.o

Read full topic

item.title: How do you stop it!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Search for this:

int UID = inStream.readDWord();

add this under:

[code] if (connectedFrom.contains(“sccoast.net”)) {
appendToBannedIps(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + connectedFrom);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

@_ikram wrote:

What’s the point of of him getting lv 5 combat, it will take the bot a minute and it will continue to spam, there are other alternative’s to stopping this spammer, runing the gameplay just for a bot is worthless, i’m writing up a stonger IP banner now, and i’ll post it on here, this IP baner will block the first IP used, and if the laternative changes it will ne auto-banned, ie it will have a proxy detector.

item.title: How do you stop it!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

WiredScape:

Thanks that worked I belive, Sucks now my skillers gotta level up

Nah, just tell them to get like 5 thieving or something. Then change the case to:

if (combat < 5 && playerLevel[playerThieving] < 5){
sendMessage("You must be at least level 5 to talk");
return;

So now in order to talk you need either 5 combat or 5 thieving.

Read full topic
